text: greetings my name is Matt word and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to give you an update on AWS snowball
customers love their snowball devices
for migrating large amounts of data into
the cloud so much so that they've asked
us to make it easier to integrate with
their existing workflows and make data
management seamless today we're adding
new ways to do this the first is an API
for third parties such as convolt to
integrate snowball into their software
so now you can request a snowball device
and move your data with full visibility
from within your usual tools secondly
we've created the S3 adapter which
allows snowball to be an S3 endpoint now
your applications can write directly to
the snowball as if it was a S3 without
any changes required all of this makes
moving data into and out of the cloud
with AWS snowball even easier than
before that's it thanks a lot
